Hey everyone :wave:
What resources would you recommend to start with the email development for HubSpot?
Are there any videos or articles you would recommend?
Are you looking for resources for email development in general, or specifically for HubSpot?

I’m HS theme developer on a daily basis but now I’m assigned with email template task. It’d be great to know where to start since obviously email development is a bit different from HubSpot themes. Any help would be much appreciated <@UKGV272KS>

I would recommend looking at <https://emailresourc.es/> for general email-related resources. If you haven’t developed emails before, that’s where you’ll want to start.

For HubSpot specifically, I would start with <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/email-template-markup>

Basically you could start with building an email template, with everything hard-coded (copy, etc.) and just simply add in the variables that are required for email. And then from there you can add in custom modules etc.

Also to note that not all of HubSpot’s functions, filters. etc work in email templates. Usually the documentation mentions this but good to be aware.

Thank you <@UKGV272KS>  :pray:
Is it possible to built a drag-and-drop template with modules similar to HubSpot webpage templates?

No, HubSpot doesn’t have true drag-and-drop for custom email templates. There are some ways to try to make a custom email template be more flexible, but not drag and drop.

If there’s a requirement for true drag-and-drop capability, then you just use the drag-and-drop editor and save a template there.
